page.title: 02Crops
page.content: The main crops of the area are {cereals,}especially {wheat}and {barley.}A large area is left as grassland, for{grazing, silage}and {hay. Straw}is made from the grain stalks after harvest, and is used as cattle bedding.{Oil seed rape}is a major new crop, probably secondary only to cereals. Its products are vegetable oil, lubricants and cattle feed.{Root crops,}such as{potatoes}and {sugar beet}are grown in smaller quantities, and one farm grows potatoes solely for a crisp factory. The rejects are fed to the cattle. Crop rotation is practised, selecting the crop according to the land type; clay or gravelly soils. Crops may vary according to how much land is contracted out to firms which produce their own crop. At the time of survey, 100 acres is contracted to{peas.}
